content: That's really helpful. I think I'll try to set a "no screen" rule for an hour before bed and replace that time with reading or listening to calming music. Also, I've been having trouble waking up on Mondays, and I remember that last week I overslept by 30 minutes on Tuesday, which made me rush to get ready for work. Do you think setting my alarm clock 15 minutes earlier each day could help me adjust to waking up earlier on Mondays?
